oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Can you sell your practice?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: McCormick, David F.
Everhart, Sherry
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: veterinary practice
ownership
practice sale
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: All practice owners have to answer an often challenging question -- when and how, to sell their practice. The decision to exit from ownership is often not an easy one as there are many details and perspectives to consider. The decision to become an owner is also a weighty decision. Both are life changing decisions and should not be taken lightly. This article contains information on both sides that should help when the time comes for the decision making.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2017; 147-150
